title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 190.5 - Weight classes.[1]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 190.5 - Weight classes.[1]
State Regulations
(a) The
weight classes for consumer grades for shell eggs shall be as follows and shall
apply to all consumer grades: Size or Weight

(b) A lot average tolerance of 3.3 percent for individual eggs in the next lower
weight class is permitted as long as no individual case within the lot exceeds
five percent. Footnotes
1 These weight classes are the same as those of the United

States Department of Agriculture as required by Public Law
91-597. Notes
